@package informative
@version 0.1.0.5

module Web.Informative.Data
data Informative
Informative :: Text -> Text -> Informative
getSegment :: Informative -> Text
getPrefix :: Informative -> Text
resourcesInformative :: [ResourceTree String]
data TextFormat
Markdown :: TextFormat
MediaWiki :: TextFormat
ReStructuredText :: TextFormat
LaTeX :: TextFormat
Textile :: TextFormat
Source :: Text -> Int -> TextFormat
Plain :: TextFormat
data TextKind
Article :: TextKind
Table :: TextKind
Mapping :: TextKind
Hint :: TextKind
Error :: TextKind
instance PersistFieldSql TextKind
instance PersistField TextKind
instance Eq TextKind
instance Ord TextKind
instance Show TextKind
instance Read TextKind
instance Enum TextKind
instance Bounded TextKind
instance PersistFieldSql TextFormat
instance PersistField TextFormat
instance Eq TextFormat
instance Ord TextFormat
instance Show TextFormat
instance Read TextFormat
instance Show (Route Informative)
instance Eq (Route Informative)
instance Read (Route Informative)
instance RouteAttrs Informative
instance RenderRoute Informative
instance ParseRoute Informative

module Web.Informative
type WikiHandler a = forall master. (YesodWikiAuth master, YesodPersist master, YesodPersistBackend master ~ SqlPersistT) => HandlerT Informative (HandlerT master IO) a
class (Yesod master, RenderMessage master FormMessage) => YesodWikiAuth master
getAuthR :: YesodWikiAuth master => HandlerT master IO (AuthRoute -> Route master)
getUserName :: YesodWikiAuth master => HandlerT master IO Text
isLoggedIn :: YesodWikiAuth master => HandlerT master IO Bool
wikiLayout :: YesodWikiAuth master => WidgetT master IO () -> HandlerT master IO Html
data WikipageGeneric backend
Wikipage :: !Text -> !Text -> !Text -> !UTCTime -> WikipageGeneric backend
wikipageTitle :: WikipageGeneric backend -> !Text
wikipageSegment :: WikipageGeneric backend -> !Text
wikipageEditor :: WikipageGeneric backend -> !Text
wikipageTimestamp :: WikipageGeneric backend -> !UTCTime
type Wikipage = WikipageGeneric SqlBackend
type WikipageId = KeyBackend SqlBackend Wikipage
data WikisectionGeneric backend
Wikisection :: !Text -> !TextFormat -> !TextKind -> WikisectionGeneric backend
wikisectionContent :: WikisectionGeneric backend -> !Text
wikisectionFormat :: WikisectionGeneric backend -> !TextFormat
wikisectionKind :: WikisectionGeneric backend -> !TextKind
type Wikisection = WikisectionGeneric SqlBackend
type WikisectionId = KeyBackend SqlBackend Wikisection
data WikirelGeneric backend
Wikirel :: !(KeyBackend backend (WikipageGeneric backend)) -> !(KeyBackend backend (WikisectionGeneric backend)) -> !Int -> WikirelGeneric backend
wikirelPage :: WikirelGeneric backend -> !(KeyBackend backend (WikipageGeneric backend))
wikirelSection :: WikirelGeneric backend -> !(KeyBackend backend (WikisectionGeneric backend))
wikirelIndex :: WikirelGeneric backend -> !Int
type Wikirel = WikirelGeneric SqlBackend
type WikirelId = KeyBackend SqlBackend Wikirel
data WikisuggGeneric backend
Wikisugg :: !Text -> !Text -> !Int -> !Text -> WikisuggGeneric backend
wikisuggPage :: WikisuggGeneric backend -> !Text
wikisuggSegment :: WikisuggGeneric backend -> !Text
wikisuggIndex :: WikisuggGeneric backend -> !Int
wikisuggCaption :: WikisuggGeneric backend -> !Text
type Wikisugg = WikisuggGeneric SqlBackend
type WikisuggId = KeyBackend SqlBackend Wikisugg
migrateWiki :: (MonadBaseControl IO m, MonadIO m, MonadLogger m) => Migration (SqlPersistT m)
readFmt :: TextFormat -> ReaderOptions -> String -> Pandoc
convFmt :: TextFormat -> String -> Html
convSect :: TextKind -> TextFormat -> Text -> Either Html [[Html]]
convTable :: TextFormat -> Text -> Either Html [[Html]]
source :: TextFormat -> Text -> Int -> TextFormat
fmtNorm :: TextFormat -> TextFormat
fmtLang :: TextFormat -> Text
fmtLine :: TextFormat -> Int
toClassname :: Text -> [Char]
remCR :: [Char] -> [Char]
renderShowArticle :: YesodWikiAuth master => [Entity Wikisugg] -> Bool -> (AuthRoute -> Route master) -> (Route Informative -> Route master) -> AuthResult -> Maybe Html -> [(Int, (Int64, Either Html [[Html]], TextKind))] -> [(Int64, Text, UTCTime)] -> Text -> HandlerT Informative (HandlerT master IO) Html
renderEditArticle :: YesodWikiAuth master => [Entity Wikisugg] -> Bool -> (AuthRoute -> Route master) -> (Route Informative -> Route master) -> Route master -> Maybe Html -> Maybe (Either Html [[Html]]) -> TextKind -> PageContent (Route master) -> Text -> HandlerT Informative (HandlerT master IO) Html
getArticleIdR :: Int -> WikiHandler Html
getArticleR :: Text -> WikiHandler Html
data SectionData
SectionData :: TextKind -> TextFormat -> Text -> Int -> Textarea -> SectionData
sdKind :: SectionData -> TextKind
sdFormat :: SectionData -> TextFormat
sdLang :: SectionData -> Text
sdFirstLine :: SectionData -> Int
sdContent :: SectionData -> Textarea
editSectionForm :: RenderMessage master FormMessage => Maybe SectionData -> Html -> MForm (HandlerT master IO) (FormResult SectionData, WidgetT master IO ())

getInsertR :: Int -> WikiHandler Html

getCreateR :: Text -> WikiHandler Html
postEditR :: Int -> WikiHandler Html
postInsertR :: Int -> WikiHandler Html
postPrependR :: Int -> WikiHandler Html
postCreateR :: Text -> WikiHandler Html

postUpR :: Int -> WikiHandler Html
postDeleteR :: Int -> WikiHandler Html
instance (YesodWikiAuth master, YesodPersist master, YesodPersistBackend master ~ SqlPersistT) => YesodSubDispatch Informative (HandlerT master IO)
instance PersistEntity (WikisuggGeneric backend)
instance PersistEntity (WikirelGeneric backend)
instance PersistEntity (WikisectionGeneric backend)
instance PersistEntity (WikipageGeneric backend)
instance PersistFieldSql (WikisuggGeneric backend)
instance PersistField (WikisuggGeneric backend)
instance PersistFieldSql (WikirelGeneric backend)
instance PersistField (WikirelGeneric backend)
instance PersistFieldSql (WikisectionGeneric backend)
instance PersistField (WikisectionGeneric backend)
